summary: becky schoenig of st. louis , missouri was shocked when she realized her brand new 2015 ford fusion had been stolen from her driveway on monday night . then , on april 1 , schoenig was shocked to learn that police had found her car just a tip from a man who recognized the vehicle as schoenig 's and would be returning it to her - but with a minor changes . she took to facebook and posted a photo of her and her new ride .
